select p.product_image1, t.dong , p.product_datetime , p.product_price , pl.product_like , p.product_category, p.product_id, p.product_name from Product p join ProductLike pl on p.product_id = pl.product_id join Town t on p.town_id = t.town_id order by pl.product_like desc limit 8;
